rooms.title: Cluster Room
rooms.name: Room for 2-4
rooms.summary: The cluster rooms are situated in the main part of the resort featuring 10 clusters (20 rooms in total). One room can accommodate 2 people (max. 4 with extra charge). Private bath room. One cluster house has two rooms. Price: 1,500 - 2,000 Baht per room per night.

rooms.title: Tree House
rooms.name: Room for 2
rooms.summary: Two tree houses are available for rent in the resort. You can choose one close to the swimming pool or another at the far end of the resort for privacy. A cozy tree house for two people. Private bath room with shower. Price: 1,800 Baht per room per night.

rooms.title: Single House
rooms.name: Room for a big party
rooms.summary: Entire house for your group. 2-3 Bedrooms with showers, living room, kitchen, and large balcony.
rooms.description: Many single houses available in our resort.
